alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 5:52AM CDT until March 26 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 552 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barnett, or 14 miles southwest of Quitman, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Quitman and De Soto around 615 AM CDT. Sykes and Crandall around 630 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pachuta and Shubuta. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
